name: Peasant
description:
The silent crowdFrom the monastery
And a winter alone

This is my first attempt to make a game by myself

What does it mean? I've just made some pixelated environment where you can move around and interact with a few things, don't expect much more than that.

This little experiment was made for #selfcarejam

Inspired by the twitter account @poem.exe

- Arrow Keys to move

- E Key to interact with your surroundings
